channel.title: How to make money on the internet
channel.description:
hey guys i was wondering how i could make a couple of 100 bucks on the internet so i started doing some searching and registered at about 50 or 60 different website claiming that you could make $150+ an hour. out of all these website only two actually paid me a decent amount of cash. now i am not saying you will be able to make $150 an hour but you should be able to make $15-20 an hour as i did an i am a totally newbie to this. anyway here are the two top sites in my opinon that paid out the best amount of cash i already made about $200 with them in about 3 days!!! (aprox 8 hours) the first one is cash lagoon:
[url=http://www.cashlagoon.com/?ref=1473] [img]http://www.cashlagoon.com/banners/test5ul.gif[/img] [/url]
(clicking banner will take you to there website)
cash lagoon i awsome as they payout every 24 hours an they also pay throught paypal!!
There website is completly free to join an they dont require a credit card for most surveys to do them.(the higher pay ones do).
the other great website i found was spidermetrix it was sooooo easy to sign up an you got points which you can turn into cash just from filling out your profile!!! the surveys pay between 10-100 points an take about 5-10 minutes to complete.
[url=http://www.spidermetrix.com/sm120.php?refspider=mutatednerd] [img]http://www.spidermetrix.com/images/logonew.gif[/img] [/url]
(clicking banner will take you to there website)
here is a table to show what you can get for your points:
Gift Shop For Points... You can buy...
12 $1 Donation to World Vision 18 $2 Donation to World Vision 46 $5 Donation to World Vision 82 $10 Donation to World Vision 130 Laminated Placemats 140 Spidermetrix.com Cap 150 Personalised Labels 160 $20 Donation to World Vision
eVouchers For Points... Voucher Value...
200 $30 eVoucher 300 $50 eVoucher 450 $75 eVoucher 600 $100 eVoucher 750 $125 eVoucher 900 $150 eVoucher 1200 $200 eVoucher 1500 $250 eVoucher 2000 $350 eVoucher
Cash Payment For Points... Cash Amount...
300 $50 Cash 450 $75 Cash 600 $100 Cash 750 $125 Cash 900 $150 Cash 1200 $200 Cash 1500 $250 Cash 2000 $350 Cash
as you can see you can also give the points you earn to your fav charity!!!
i hope you enjoyed this tut on the best websites to make money on and if you have anymore websites i would be happy to add them if they are good enought.
